content: Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc  and PepsiCo  on Tuesday both announced plans to buy alternative drinks makers  the latest examples of beverage companies branching into products perceived as healthier as soda sales decline.

title: Dr Pepper Snapple  Pepsi buy drinks makers in bid to diversify

name: Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc

content: Jan 7 Keurig Green Mountain Inc  maker of the K-Cup single-serve coffee pod  signed a deal with Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc to sell capsules that make its sodas in Keurig's planned cold-drink machine  the Wall Street Journal reported.
name: Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc
title: Keurig  Dr Pepper Snapple sign deal for new cold-drink machine -WSJ
